title: Tuguk
author: Tuguk
content: We’re inviting you to participate in the StableBattle MassPvP Tournament in Goerli testnet!StableBattle MassPvP tournament offers an estimated prize pool of $300.The rules are very simple:The battle lasts 10 minutes, in case of a draw the time is extended by 15 secondsAllocation to teams is randomPlayers (knights) will get points only in the Red VS Blue Tournament, which start at 16:00–17:00 UTCIn each battle a Knight may earn points: +1 point for each killed Knight from the opposing team, -0.5 points for each own deathIf you quit and return to the battle, you’ll receive 1 death credit (but your health bar will be reset to maximum)For participating on the winning team, the points gained in that battle are multiplied by 1.5At the end of the tournament, the prize pool is distributed based on the points acquiredExample: During the battle you killed 10 enemy knights and died 4 times, with your team winning.(10–0.5x4)x1.5 = 12 pointsAfter 5 battles you have accumulated 60 points and the sum of all tournament points is 600 points. Your prize will be 300/600 x 60 = $30.First steps before the MassPvP TournamentStableBattle does not ask for any payment from you to start playing in the test. You’ll just need to use your MetaMask wallet to create an account.You will need to direct your MetaMask to the Goerli Test Network, accessible via wallet settings.You will then need some testnet USDT tokens and GoerliETH, which you can easily collect from our freely-giving faucet http://faucet.stablebattle.io/ (if you will have any issue, you can request tokens in our discord channel)After logging into the game, stake some test USDTs to create (mint) your first NFT character. The ability to play will be unlocked as soon as your NFT character is minted.Tournament basicsPlayers are able to start testing the game at any time http://faucet.stablebattle.ioThe main tournament will take place January 29th 16:00–17:00 UTCThe exact start time of the tournament season will be broadcasted via our Twitter and Discord.Feel free to join our Discord serverand ask any questions!Ready to battle in MassPvP with your friends for real money? Join a tournament and show your might, Knight!Discord: https://discord.gg/g8cu7UfYntTwitter: https://twitter.com/StableBattleWebsite: https://stablebattle.io/Client of the game: https://faucet.stablebattle.io/
